subject: The Latest HBO Preview
event:
The premiere of HBO's GAME OF THRONES series creeps closer and closer with every passing day
(there's a countdown on the home page of my website), and the promotion continues to ramp up.  A new trailer made its debut this evening.

For those who missed it, enjoy:

<lj-embed id="134"/>

And on other fronts... it's still snowing on Skull Island, but one of the krakens is done and t'other is down to the last tentacle.  Closer and closer... inch by inch, word by word, step by step...

props.taglist: dance with dragons, hbo, game of thrones

comments.article: SLAY THE BEAST!
The video isn't available anymore =\
A whole inch!!!!...ok...we´ll call it... Polbo á Feira "ao Martin"
comments.subject: Inch by inch

comments.article:
The best trailer yet! Love finally seeing the actors in action.

Good to hear the krakens are nearly defeated, and to hear your optimism about getting closer and closer.
Yowsa! They just keep getting better and better!

How excited for you!

Just cracked the spine on the first book!

I am so jealous of people like you! I wish I could turn back time and start the story right now! Instead I finished the last installment years ago and waiting to see whats next! I found it hard not to devour each book one after the other becasue its such a great story but I highly recommend you take your time going through it or you will end up waiting to know what happens next. And that can take a while!
comments.subject: Re:Just cracked the spine on the first book

comments.article:
The trailer is phenomenal!

And thank you for the update on ADWD. Good to know the kraken's on the verge of surrender. Hope the wolf proves as pliable :)
Thanks for the update. Love the new Trailer.  You never answered my last question. That is if you dont mind..  How many manuscript pages are you up to?
comments.subject: Love you George

comments.article:
I don’t think you will get an answer to that question (unless you happen to know personally Mr. Martin and ask him in person). Many others have asked similar questions over time and it is something that he has never answered with any kind of seriousness...

see his web site on the « Ice and fire update » for more on that subject (http://georgerrmartin.com/if-update.html).

The best we generally get for our beloved author are vague animal metaphors that get us some kind of insight on his progress... Unless you can manage to be at the same party that he’s attending (at a CON or some other merry event) and manage to get him drunk enough, he might just slip some juicy technical details your way :¬)
comments.subject: Re: Love you George

comments.article:
THIS IS BLOOOY AWESOME!

This is so you, so Game of Thrones. You seem to be very luck with your screen adaptation. HAve you already seen something more than a trailer? Is it as good?
How telling is it that I got pretty excited by the trailer and then my heart raced at word of the battle on Skull Island?

Even though I think they're overdoing it with "new" trailers every week(which somehow still show the same scenes 90% of the time, in the same order and with the same voice-overs), I've got to admit this one's the best so far.

And I'm glad to hear the battle is going your way, Mr. Martin.
That was EPIC.
That was EPIC.

Dance isn't the  last book.  There are 2 more minimum after it.  But seeing as the series was planned to be 4 books long my the time the first one was completed, I'm guessing at 8 for the final number.
comments.subject: Re: Winter is Comming

comments.article: just fyi, A Dance With Dragons (the fifth book) will not be the last in the series. That being said, this series is worth the read even without a conclusion in the near future.
That new trailer gave me shivers.  This is looking even better than I expected.  Can't wait.

WHY ISN'T IT THEN YET!

I pray non-denominationally to some vague amalgamation of Gods that this is successful and we get a season, or two, for each book.
Each preview looks better than the last - you must be very pleased. It's also great to see the progress you're making on the next book. 2011 is going to be a great year!
comments.subject: Looking great!

comments.article: Niagara Falls!
comments.subject: Slowly I turned…

comments.article: Region locked trailer? Nothing is loading for me. :(
Try winter-is-coming.net They always have the utube link up almost immediately.
I love it.  Damn, I just have to ask... when do we get a peak at the wall?  If you or Ty have seen it I sure would love to get your first impressions.  Sorry if I'm asking too much!
As much as each new trailer excites me, hearing you beating them krakens into submission warms my heart even more. Go for the eyes Mr Martin, go for the eyes!
OMG! CERSEI!

YES! KEEP AT IT, INCH BY INCH WINS THE BATTLE!

I still can't get over how remarkable and gothic-looking they made the iron throne in the show. Gonna be awesome.

Wow, this is probably my favorite trailer yet. I'm so excited!

College is killing me right now, but looking forward to this is definitely helping to keep me sane. ;)
I personally will spend the latter half of april going crazy with the few friends who also like the book.. i dont know if sane is the right word lol
comments.subject: sane?
